event: Our T-RO submission is conditionally accepted! It should be seen soon after our revision.
The CDC submission coauthored with Cody Fan is accepted!
The proposal with Kenny Chen was selected as the finalist of the Qualcomm Innovation Fellowship!
Prof. Daniela Rus visited our lab!
Presented a poster on localization in SoCal Robotic Symposium at Caltech, Pasadena, CA.
Passed my qualifying exam and became a Ph.D. candidate.
My team was awarded grand prize in the first UCLA-Salesforce Data Science Challenge.
